"Whoaa now," Beachcomber says, reacting to this picture. Firedrill
remembered his training, and the procedure, but he didnt know which robots
where on his team. "Ummmmm, Beachcomber, go ask her for intstructions", he
ask. Beachcomber head back inside. Once ther he opens a commlink to
Firedrill so he can hear whats goin on. "Hmmmmmm" he thinks to himself.
"Iron Raptor, there seems to be a sort of skrimmage between a Dragon, and
two robots, with a whole lot of spectators. What do you want us to do?"

Cliffjumper wasnt ready to wait around though. He started to walk forward.
"Okay, whats the going on here," he asks, starting to show some anger.
